about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Software Developer
about.paragraph1: Software Developer with over 4 years of experience in frontend and backend development, specialized in creating interactive, scalable, and high-performance web applications. Expert in React, Next.js, Node.js, and Python, with a track record in complex migrations, performance optimization, modular design, and microfrontend architecture.
about.paragraph2: Passionate about modern technologies (Zustand, React Query, Tailwind, ShadCN/UI) and Generative AI, with experience in building robust APIs and geospatial solutions. Recognized for delivering high-impact solutions and leading technological innovation projects.
about.paragraph3: With experience in enterprise automations, critical technology migrations, and legacy system modernization, always focused on improving scalability and user experience.

highlights.modernDesc: Zustand, React Query, Tailwind, Generative AI

about.highlightDesc: My research on Blockchain and FHIR HL7 for electronic health record interoperability was published in an international Q2 journal (DOI: 10.3991/ijoe.v20i03.44507), demonstrating my ability to combine technology and innovation in real-impact solutions.

professional.title: Join Belcorp

professional.title: HolaLink

professional.title: Lucy System
professional.description: Robust web system developed with Django for business management. Led complete backend and frontend development, implementing real-time communication with WebSockets.

professional.title: Fractal Platform
professional.description: Development of scalable APIs with .NET Core and dynamic views with Razor (SSR). Implemented real-time communication functions with Slack API and WebSockets for business collaboration.
